rotate_3d_vector

conan.build_modules.build_utils.rotate_3d_vector(vec: ndarray, rotational_axis: ndarray, angle: float) → ndarray

Rotates a vector around a specified rotational axis by a given angle using Rodrigues’ rotation formula.

Parameters

vecnp.ndarray

The vector to be rotated.

rotational_axisnp.ndarray

The axis around which the vector vec is rotated. Should be a 3D vector.

anglefloat

The rotation angle in radians.

Returns

np.ndarray

The rotated vector.
